# Terra Switch

{insert description}

## Getting Started

- Install with [npmjs](https://www.npmjs.com):
  - `npm install terra-switch`

## Usage

```jsx
import React from 'react';
import Switch from 'terra-switch';

<Switch {props...} />
```
